lines.text:
[Watching Oscar strangling Ricky with his own intestines]
You got a lot of guts, Oscar!

[last lines; Riki-Oh breaks the prison wall]
You're all free now!

[upon discovering the bullets in Ricky's chest in an X-ray]
Why didn't you let the doctors take the five bullets out of you?
Souvenirs.
I was promised seven bags of rice to turn you into mince meat and put you in a pie.
Alright! You got a lot of guts Oscar!
Ye talkin' to me?
Tarzan! You're really useless! I was betting on you!

[Covered in the blood of Tarzan]
Enough! We're human beings! HUUUMAAAAN BEEEEIIIINGS!
I'm tougher than you think! The warden of any prison has to be the very best in kung fu.
Rogan's kung fu is unorthodox.
[in American DVD subtitles]
You were as strong as a bull, and so I named you Ricky.
You'll die mutilated today!
I'll finish both of you bastards today!
[punches half an inmate's head off]

[to the Assistant Warden]
Now it's your turn!
[punches him so hard, the AW's remaining eye comes out]

[after Alan refuses to kill Riki-Oh]
This time we just won't cut off your tongue!
[skins Alan alive]

[to Oscar]
If I don't kill you, you won't quit, will you?

[to the Warden's son]
Well, how was Hawaii?
[the Warden's son puts his chewed gun on the AW's forehead]
Warden, the prison's menu for tomorrow is ready; Please have a look. We have some beans, some vegetables, and some meat for lunch.
[begins to eat some of the food]
Don't you think it's too much?
[starts to divide the food]
Here, we'll half the vegetables and beans, the meat we'll save for dinner.
[starts to throw a tantrum]
Oh, come on, behave yourself! The men won't die from hunger.
You eat like a lousy king! Even your dog gets a big steak.

[overhears the inmate]
Not enough to eat. Right, I'll give you some more.
[takes the inmate and shoves his arm in the meat grinder; Then the Warden shows the pan with inmate's ground up arm in it to him as the inmate screams in pain]
Enough now?
Ying is the reincarnation of two fireflies.
He tied his own tendons!

[Oscar has blinded Ricky]
Some powder glass from the assistant warden. Let's see you're as strong, when your blind.
[Ricky starts punching the air due to not being able to see, Oscar then takes his knife and cuts Ricky's arm, he then knocks Ricky to the ground]
Well blind man, you're arm's gone now. Ricky, you're finished.
So you can still see, but your right arm's crippled. You're still a goner.
[Oscar lunges at Ricky but he avoids it, Rick slams his hand against the back of Oscar's head making his right eyeball pop out, several birds claw and peck at it]
